name: Spin Down
description:
Come and relax with a short puzzle game - 5 levels of dice rolling brainteasers that only get tougher as you go along. There are only 3 things you need to know to get started:

1. Roll the die with WASD

2. Your goal is to roll your die onto the red square with the correct side facing up.

3. And you have a limited number of moves per puzzle.

This was my first time completing a project in Unity. If you'd like to leave some feedback, I'd appreciate it.
